Textentry.name: Agent
Textentry.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Courier@ComBot_Courier]:SetText["This field is used to filter the available agents displayed in the selection list below."]

listbox.Name: AgentList
listbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Courier@ComBot_Courier]:SetText["This field is used to select agents to be added to the list of agents for which to run missions. To add make agents available to this list, open People & Places, search for the agent, and double click to start a conversation."]

Button.name: Add
Button.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Courier@ComBot_Courier]:SetText["This button adds the currently selected Agent, or the name typed into the filter field if no agent is selected, to the Agent list"]

listbox.Name: Agents
listbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Courier@ComBot_Courier]:SetText["This field contains the agents ComBot will run courier missions for."]

Textentry.name: Pickup
Textentry.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Courier@ComBot_Courier]:SetText["This field needs to contain the exact name of your pickup bookmark. The bookmark can be a station if you are picking up from a personal hangar or corporate hangar, or a location if you are picking up from a Player Owned Station structure. If you are picking up from an Fleet Hangar or Jetcan, the bookmark needs to be any bookmark in the system where your fleet is mining."]

listbox.Name: PickupList
listbox.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Courier@ComBot_Courier]:SetText["This field needs to contain the exact name of your pickup bookmark. The bookmark can be a station if you are picking up from a personal hangar or corporate hangar, or a location if you are picking up from a Player Owned Station structure. If you are picking up from an Fleet Hangar or Jetcan, the bookmark needs to be any bookmark in the system where your fleet is mining."]

TextEntry.name: PickupContainer
TextEntry.OnMouseEnter: UIElement[Information@InformationFrame@Courier@ComBot_Courier]:SetText["This field is used to supply ComBot with an identifier for your pickup location. If you are picking up from an Fleet Hangar, this needs to contain the name of the pilot flying your Fleet Hangar. If you are picking up from a Player Owned Station structure, this needs to contain the structure's name."]
